speech:
Here are some of the commands I'll respond to! Please note that commands which are under construction may not work properly.

/food - Hungry? Let me introduce some of UTown's culinary options to you!
/menu - What's being served in the dining hall today?
/checklounge - Check to see if your favourite lounge is currently available.
/checklaundry - Check to see if the washing machines and dryers in your RC are available.
/randomtelegroup - Recommends a Telegram group, channel or bot from our list of recommendations. Use /telegroups for the full list!
/help - Shows this list again.
